div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2288 Seui, 75 km. NNE of Cagliari, Sar- dinia, 1960 Burial: c. 216 B.C. Contents: 124 AE Carthage: 94 Sicilian mint (as SNGCop. 94, 102, 109) 27 Sardinian mint (as SNGCop. 127, 192, 219, 246, 387) Roman: 3 (intrusive) Disposition: Sassari Forteleoni, AIIN 1968, pp. 77-81, illus.
